docTitle.titlePart:
SEARCHES FOR SIGNATURES FROM GAUGE MEDIATED
SUSY BREAKING

byline.affiliation: University of Victoria, Physics and Astronomy

front.address: PO Box 3040 STN CSC Victoria BC V8W 3N7, CANADA
front.div:
Gauge-mediated SUSY breaking is an attractive model both theoretically and ex-
perimentally. In this paper, gauge-mediated SUSY breaking signatures studied
with the OPAL experiment are summarized.
front.note: cr494: submitted to World Scientific on June 16, 2002
